content:
Hi Community. We are trying to map doctor's preference card (DPC) data to FHIR. Specifically, the DPC will have at least a provider and a procedure in the header, and a list of items (such as equipment, supply, etc.) . See an example here (https://app.prefcards.com/r/b745fda2-c957-49be-bc7a-fe41bada759c)

FHIR doesn't have a native resource for that, so we are considering the following options:

1, Using a FHIR List resource

  1. Using a FHIR Group resource
  2. Build a custom resource based on the FHIR basic resource.

I'm wondering if anyone in the community has gone through this and have some advices? Really appreciate it!
It's early-stage but you might want to look at http://build.fhir.org/inventoryreport.html and talk with the #Orders and Observation WG if this looks close to your needs.
Thanks Josh, I'll look into that (seems it's still in ballot status).
